website_summaries.verdict: Distances itself in terms of aesthetics, but the high price may be more than you want to spend on an electric skillet.
pros: Sports a round design that's deep and spacious enough to accommodate up to seven quarts of food
Combines a sleek, stainless steel finish with an effective non-stick interior
cons: A few customers gripe about damaged or defective skillets upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Had for 2 months, used ot twice, now its broken. It will not simmer, it gets to temperature and completely shuts off. This was a very expensive skillet for only being able to use twice
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Huge and deep, easy to cook and clean.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a fan of All Clad cookware since I bought my first set in 2000. Still use it to this day! Anyway, their electrics don’t disappoint. This skillet is huge and deep with a super strong nonstick surface. You don’t need excess oil or fats to cook. Electric element works great and keeps a steady temp. Easy to clean, too. We hand wash ours, although booklet says it’s dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Paula F.

customer_reviews.title: Not All-Clad quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this pan!!!! Waste of money! Not the old quality All-Clad was known for... Pan shuts off on its own. You have no idea what the temperature is...The light on the plug stopped working. Heat un-even. And you can only cook certain foods in it.. No frying chicken!! And all this after 3 uses!!! And they won’t let me return it ...China really put it to us on this purchase! 😡
customer_reviews.author: laura Hohman

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric Frypan ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several electric frypans over 56 years of marriage. This is by far the very, very best! Even heating. Easy cleanup, predictable temperatures, it is an amazing cooking utensil! We are down to a household of 2 most days, and it is fairly large. It would have served us well while our kids were still home, but it works for two, as well. The heating is so even and dependable that even i, a "so-so" cook cannot mess up! Expensive? Maybe. But I bet had I had it several years .. or decades... ago, it would still be earning its keep!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer senior citizen.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Had a large Calphalon for years, used it often. This is the size and quality you would expect for this price. Great looking serving warmer as well. Used it as a slow cooker over the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: R.E. Tired

customer_reviews.title: All clad skillet
customer_reviews.text: Given the price, I am hoping that it will be better than the previous skillets I have bought from different manufacturers, including Cuisinart . I have used it 5 times already for at most 20 minutes each time and it seems to be worth the cost. It is heavy which I like and very easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY AND EASY TO CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit so far. Easy to clean and maintain. The only thing i would improve is on the dial system. I is hard to see this color light and the temperature selection is too small to read fro us elderly people, otherwise the electric skillet if beautiful and works great!! I is large and will require a special place on the counter top[.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES G.

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT IS DEFECTIVE.
customer_reviews.text: The product is defective. I tried to use it for the first time yesterday, Nov. 9,2019, and IT DID NOT HEAT. I WANT A REPLACEMENT THAT WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad 2nd party seller
customer_reviews.text: VERY USED ITEM- Scratched badly inside dish and lid broken on arrival
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! Table side cooking, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Maluhia

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: All-Clad advertisements claim that its products are made in the USA, which is blatantly false. I bought an All-Clad 7Qt Electric Skillet at a premium price, and it shows that it is clearly made in China. Very poor business ethics, All-Clad... Very misleading...
customer_reviews.author: David R. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Large with even heat distribution. Just right for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: Have been without an electric skillet for too too long. Didn’t want a cheap version. This is large and with even heat. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly for me. I don’t need an oven. This serves my purpose when cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys this more than her cast iron pans.
customer_reviews.author: cja

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, even cooking and the fact that it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: flying dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Love my skillet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my skillet so much that it comes with my family when we go vacation to the mainland, Kaua’i, Big Island and O'ahu. Love the size and I can cook a day's meal in it. Aloha from Maui!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Corrina Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best fish cooker and fryer I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Best fish cooker and fryer I have owned! Set the temperature and cook! Perfect for holding temperature even when full. High quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: frederick newman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The pan has met all of my needs such as: frying bacon, spaghetti or stir frying. The size is awesome for a family of 5 or 7 servings. It is easy to clean and store. My family is impress with quality being stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: cornelia m. devlin

customer_reviews.title: Best Pan I ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan it is great. I make chicken marsala sausage and peppers chicken tenders pork chops . It seems to make food more flavorful than my old frying pan. The first time I used it wasn’t as good until it became seasoned from using it . I also have the 8 quart soup pan.
customer_reviews.author: bridget

customer_reviews.title: Fine Non-Stick Skillet
customer_reviews.text: Even heat, nice non stick surface, finely tuned temperature control, well fit lid, control is easy to use. Cooks great. Most of these skillets are great initially and then tend to break down quickly as they age. I cannot attest to the durability of the non stick surface long term - but right now - it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KFTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: Received the item on November 5th it quit working on November 14th. Used 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: All Clad is a very good brand.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to replace a much used and much loved All Clad electric skillet. It served the family well and was replaced with the exact same brand and style!
customer_reviews.author: WeLovePugs

customer_reviews.title: Best electric skillet ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this electric skillet - it is perfect. As usual, All-Clad is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Smith

customer_reviews.title: Go to skillet.
customer_reviews.text: This skillet had the best reviews. I use it every day. Be aware it is big.
customer_reviews.author: pel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: I had to retire my 50 year old farberware electric skillet and was so disappointed when I found Farberware did not offer this product. I did my research and bought the All Clad electric skillet. I fried chicken, and it turned out perfect. If you are looking for a fry pan that keeps consistent temperature, I highly recommend this brand. Large enough to fry several pieces of chicken (2 breasts, 2 thighs, 2 legs, and 2 wings) cut from 1 chicken. I highly recommend this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley K Alexander

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this All Clad skillet from Amazon. It was non-working, defective within 3 months, and past the Amazon return date. Amazon customer service advised me to contact and work directly with the All Clad manufactor, under warranty policy, customer service. After a long and painful customer service hassel I was informed by All Clad the Amazon order was fullfilled and shipped from an unauthorized seller. No warranty available. After a ton of frustration back to Amazon customer service and they agreed to process a return. What? Unauthorized seller! Did my expensive All Clad skillet come from some junk overstock warehouse? Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Vandermay

customer_reviews.title: Loved this Skillet BUT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this skillet in Feb 2019, loved using it. Unfortunately, the temperature dial burned out less than a year later and there was no way I could get it replaced even i would gladly pay for it. There is no replacement dial available!!!! I contacted allclad.com and they didn't seem to know anything about it. A couple answers did not pertain to my request. It was not a cheap skillet and I would hope a replacement part would be available. So I plan to toss a perfectly good skillet but unusable without a plug.
customer_reviews.author: ba

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the electric skillet for several weeks, and cannot believe how great this appliance is. Even temperature at any setting and unbelievably easy to clean with mild soap and water with no scrubbing. Expensive for sure, but so is throwing out $80 skillets every 6-8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teflon is bad for your health
customer_reviews.text: I would have bought this, but it has nonstick coating which will eventually peel and get into my food. Why on earth would you ruin a perfectly good skillet? Stainless steel doesn't need teflon coating.
customer_reviews.author: Scornful Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I got the electric skillet from homegoods today, I made chili in it, it heats up quick and cooks evenly, and cleanup is is so easy. I only paid 99 dollars for it a homegoods
customer_reviews.author: Janice and Tim

customer_reviews.title: Does not get hot enough
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift. it doesn't get hot enough to fry chicken; the temperature light does not work. I do not recommend this skillet unless you use it for simmering only.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing skillet! We RV and I hated having multiple pots and pans. We now use just this. As an added bonus we can take it outside and use it also. Pretty enough to use as a serving piece! Wish I had gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: kaskas

customer_reviews.title: I hope the quality stays as good as all of the All Clad products do
customer_reviews.text: I did not think this would be used as much as I do! Absolutely can’t live without it now! I hope the quality stays as good as all of the All Clad products do. I put this on my island where I like to visit with guests while cooking - fab fab fab!
customer_reviews.author: C. Matosian

product_meta.title: All-Clad SK492 Electric Skillet with Adjustable Temperature Dial, 7 Quart, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: This All-Clad SK492D50 electric 7 qt. Nonstick skillet can cook all your favorite dishes to perfection, right from the countertop. Inspired by the All-Clad cookware range in both design and performance, the round 14-inch skillet features a single-ply Stainless Steel construction allowing it to heat evenly and efficiently for perfectly browned food, from the center all the way to the edges. Tall, straight sides help prevent splatters, and the temperature can be adjusted with a simple turn of the dial. Even more, the stainless-steel skillet's nonstick eternal coating ensures effortless food release and makes cleanup a breeze. On its own or as a way of expanding an existing All-Clad collection, the All-Clad electric skillet provides exceptional versatility, impressive precision, and everyday cooking convenience.
feature_bullets: Beautiful look, perfect to go from the countertop to the Table
See-through glass lid and stainless-steel handles permanently secured with Stainless Steel rivets
Precise results: bonded metal construction for even heat distribution
Adjustable and removable temperature dial: easily cook from Warm to sear with precise temperatures in-between for perfect control
Large 7 qtr. multi-use capacity: Feed your whole family
Dishwasher-safe nonstick interior: nonstick coating ensures effortless food release and cleanup is a breeze

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars58 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
